channel.title: Exchange Rates on Rodrigo Mariscal
channel.description: Recent content in Exchange Rates on Rodrigo Mariscal

item.title: Foreign Exchange Rate Common Factor
item.description: Foreign Exchange Currency Movements Currency markets tend to move in-sync reflecting world market trends, but also it’s common that countries have own factors that affect their currency. In this post, I’ll show a way to separate the common factor from the own country factor.
